item.description:
The hike is on! Bundle up - it's going to be a bit chilly. Please make sure that your dog(s) can deal with the cold as well.



This Dog Hike is at Machimoodus State Park.

Fred will be leading this hike.



Note:
We have added a Paypal donation link and some sponsors to our page to help cover the cost of this site.
They are on either the left or right side of the page depending on which page.



New Text Message Notifications:
To receive Text Messages with any latest updates: (Msg rates from your cell phone plan may apply)
Text: "join hikingwithdogs" (no quotes) to 74685
If we have any updates at the last minute we will text them out.



We actually hike in Sunrise Resort (which has been abandoned) to the right of it to avoid the people who don't like our dogs off leash.

Park in the parking lot of the park and then we will head to the right to get off the park property and onto the abandoned resort property.

This hike has asphalt, trails, hills, water and mud. Boots or similar protective footwear is recommended for this hike.

Length:
about 3 miles long

Time:
about 1.5 hours

Location:
Route 151 South (Leesville Rd)
Next to Sunrise Resort
Moodus, CT 06469

Directions:
Click here for directions

Trail Map: (of the park - not the Resort)
Click here for PDF



Weather
Click here for forecast...



Contact:
Please contact me if you're running late or need directions en-route
via voice / SMS at 860-227-4027, or
via email at fredlunau@fastmail.fm
item.how_to_find_us: Fred will be there in his blue go-kart.
item.name: Machimoodus State Park
